definition: tree trunk/main part of sth/to manage/to work/to do/capable/cadre/to kill (slang)/to fuck (vulgar)
clean/completely/only/net (income, exports etc)/(Chinese opera) painted face male role
to fall or drop/(of the sun) to set/(of a tide) to go out/to lower/to decline or sink/to lag or fall behind/to fall onto/to rest with/to get or receive/to write down/whereabouts/settlement
colloquial reading for 落[luo4] in certain compounds
to leave out/to be missing/to leave behind or forget to bring/to lag or fall behind

sentences.english: I see pictures of small pistols, and I hope, quick and painless.
sentences.chinese: 我看到小手枪，而且我真希望，干净利落，豪无痛苦。

sentences.english: Lips well developed but not pendulous giving a clean finish.
sentences.chinese: 嘴唇发达但不下垂，末端干净利落。

sentences.english: The shot is clean, and fatal, just behind the front leg.
sentences.chinese: 这一枪干净利落而且致命，打在了鹿的前腿后面。

sentences.english: Auto balanced scraper ensures even pressuer;
sentences.chinese: 自动平衡之油刀，刮油干净利落。

sentences.english: That clear-cut position, the water raised up after the very satisfying.
sentences.chinese: 那姿势干净利落，水提上来以后非常满足。

sentences.english: The fighter neatly fended off a dangerous blow.
sentences.chinese: 拳击手干净利落地挡开了危险的一击。

sentences.english: The student gave a clear, crisp answer to the teacher's question.
sentences.chinese: 学生干净利落地归答了老师白勺问题。
箭杆插在它的前胸上，一记干净利落的击杀。
2他干净利落地解决了这个问题。

sentences.english: This will provide you with a cleaner, less painful death than you would otherwise experience.
sentences.chinese: 我的方法会比你可能经历的各种死法都更加干净利落。

definition: (of speech or actions) direct and efficient/without fooling around
see 乾脆利落|干脆利落[gan1 cui4 li4 luo5]
lit. wading in mud and water/a slovenly job/sloppy
to do something at one go/to flow smoothly
lit. moving clouds and flowing water (idiom)/fig. very natural and flowing style of calligraphy, writing, etc/natural and unforced
